pageProduct.name: Sukin Purely Ageless Intensive Firming Sheet Mask Sachet
pageProduct.description:
General Information

WITH PURE RIBOSE, CLINICALLY PROVEN TO IMPROVE THE APPEARANCE OF WRINKLES, NATURALLY.

Warnings

AVOID CONTACT WITH EYES. DO NOT USE ON BROKEN OR IRRITATED SKIN. IF IRRITATION OCCURS RINSE IMMEDIATELY AND DISCONTINUE USE. WE RECOMMEND PATCH TESTING. FOR EXTERNAL USE ONLY.

Common Uses

Improve skin elasticity and reduce the signs of ageing with our Intensive Firming Sheet Mask. Featuring Pure Ribose; a super sugar derived from corn seed, along with Acacia Gum (known for its instant tightening effects) to leave skin visibly firmer, smoother and more hydrated after use. Our sheet mask is made with 100% natural Cotton fibres that will Biodegrade 6 months after use.

Ingredients

INGREDIENTS: Water (Aqua), Butylene Glycol, Glycerin, Lecithin, Ribose, Mesembryanthemum Crystallinum Callus Extract (Ice Plant Stem Cell), Ficus Carica (Fig) Fruit Extract, Magnesium Aspartate, Zinc Gluconate, Copper Gluconate, Citrus Grandis (Grapefruit) Peel Oil, Citrus Auratium Bergamia (Bergamot) Oil, Hydrogenated Starch Hydrolysate, Succinoglycan, Polyglyceryl-10 Laurate, Hydroxyacetophenone, Pentylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Citric Acid, Glycosyl Trehalose, Limonene, Linalool*.
*Natural Component of Essential Oils

Directions

APPLICATION: Open packet, unfold mask and apply to your face. Leave on for 15 to 30 minutes and then gently remove. Massage remaining serum into your skin. Don’t forget to recycle this packaging!
